# PAD::GET_IS_USING_ALTERNATE_HANDBRAKE

## Summary
Returns whether the player has the alternate handbrake profile option set (switching INPUT_VEH_HANDBRAKE and INPUT_VEH_DUCK)

## Returns
* **BOOL**
